description: Giant hyssop (Agastache 'Summer Breeze') is an amazing plant species that can bring beauty and fragrance to your garden. This hardy, drought-tolerant perennial has an abundant, evergreen growth of mounding gray-green foliage with lavender-blue flowers that attract bees and butterflies. An aromatic oil in the leaves creates a pleasant, minty-basil smell when touched, so it's ideal for gardens with a scent-theme. It blooms in summer and fall, with bright upright spikes of lavender-blue flower clusters above the foliage. Best of all, giant hyssop is easy to grow, and can reach a height of up to 3 feet tall. So if you’re looking for a stunning and fragrant addition to your garden, the giant hyssop is sure to be a hit!
